newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB sets 13-wk bill auction at max 12.2 pct.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB sets 13-wk bill auction at max 12.2 pct.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) on Wednesday set a Dutch-style auction offering five billion crowns in 13-week liquidity bills for Thursday, with maximum gross yield on bids set at 12.2 percent, the CNB said.
Maximum yield in the last CNB bill auction on April 3 was set at 12.4 percent, but fell to 12.2 percent at the auction.
The three-month Prague interbank offered rate (PRIBOR) stood at 12.37 percent on Wednesday, up two basis points from Tuesday.
